entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
